General.Name: MNC Studios International Tbk PT
General.Description: PT MNC Digital Entertainment Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the content, digital, talent management, and other businesses in Indonesia. It produces and distributes television content through traditional and digital platforms, such as free-to-air TV, pay per view, catch up TV, over the top, video on demand, movie theater, and internet protocol television. The company also produces drama series, FTV, film, infotainment, and reality and game shows, as well as offers ad and talent management services. The company was formerly known as PT MNC Studios International TBK and changed its name to PT MNC Digital Entertainment Tbk in March 2022. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT MNC Digital Entertainment Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Media Nusantara Citra Tbk.
General.Address: MNC Pictures Building, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11530
